CustomField.formula: IF( OR( VALUE( MID( TEXT( CreatedDate - 0.2083 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 0, VALUE( MID( TEXT( CreatedDate - 0.2083 ), 12, 2 ) ) = 12 ), "12", TEXT( VALUE( MID( TEXT( CreatedDate - 0.2083 ), 12, 2 ) ) - IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( CreatedDate - 0.2083 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, 0, 12 ) ) ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( CreatedDate - 0.2083 ), 15, 2 ) & ":" & MID( TEXT( CreatedDate - 0.2083 ), 18, 2 ) & " " & IF( VALUE( MID( TEXT( CreatedDate - 0.2083 ), 12, 2 ) ) < 12, "AM", "PM" )
CustomField.label: Hora de Creaci√≥n
